entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
